>But oh woe, to my utter despair, scen-edit STILL gives the same
error!  THAT WAS WHY I LIKED GLADIATOR SO MUCH!  I like creating
levels; you should've seen me on ZZT.  I was limited by a tiny hard
drive on my old
 computer; I'd love to use it on a 160GB one.  I could make BILLIONS of
 maps!  But why won't the scenario editor work!?  WHAT FORCES CONSPIRE
 TO KILL MY FUN!!?  I'm okay.. I'm okay.. *sniff*

I love creating maps, too.  Especially maps that try out new ideas
like I did with my "Weakest Link" scenarios (#137 and #151).  My
favorite map is, of course, "The Large Army" (#161).  It has the
elements I like best: one on one battles along with taking a large
number of opponents at once.  Unfortunately, I couldn't plot a really
good thread to my scenarios.
